reviews.review: This is my second time purchasing from this Seller. I love how cheap the item was compared to a lot of other shops on . I will definitely be making another purchase in the future!!

Package says 4 but only contained only 3.
The package also displays 4 flavor options, Strawberry, Watermelon, Blue Raspberry and Cherry. One would think you‚Äôd receive one of each of the four flavors to make up the 4 pops per package. Instead I got two Strawberry and one Watermelon. You might have better luck. Thankfully the pops weren‚Äôt crushed like others have mentioned.

title: Bazooka Candy Brands Holiday Candy Box - 18 Count Lollipops W/ Assorted Flavors From Ring Pop, Push Pop, Baby Bottle Pop & Juicy Drop - Candy Gift Box For The Holidays - 12.4 Ounce (Pack Of 1)
description: About this item            BULK HOLIDAY CANDY BOX: 18 Count candy box contains 6 Ring Pop, 4 Push Pop, 4 Baby Bottle Pop, and 4 Juicy Drop Lollipops for a variety of fun during the holidays!     SWEET TREATS: Perfect Christmas gift candy box for friends, take with you to holiday parties, or share with your friends and family this holiday season     ASSORTED CANDY FLAVORS: Each box contains a selection of mouth-watering fruity flavors including Strawberry (all), Blue Raspberry (all), Cosmic Strawberry Lemonade (BBP), Cherry Watermelon (PP) Watermelon (RP), and Wild cherry Berry (JD), so everyone can have their favorite during the holidays!     HOLIDAY VARIETY PARTY PACK: Bazooka Candy Brands' variety of lollipops in bulk make deliciously fun treats for kids ! The perfect treats to share, use as holiday party favors or give as a gift at your next holiday party     FESTIVE SHELF-STABLE TREATS: Perfect treats to have around the house for kids and the whole family to enjoy. Or give it as a candy gift for your upcoming holiday party because everyone loves Ring Pop, Push Pop, Baby Bottle Pop, and Juicy Drop!

reviews.name: Jeramy J.
reviews.reviewTitle: What to do, ohhhh what to do....
reviews.review: I bought this to put in my 8 yo son's Christmas stocking. But as good as it looks to eat, I'm not to sure any of it will make it til Christmas morning. Such a horrible predicament for me to be in. Think he'll notice if I sneak an item or two??? I should've ordered 2 of them. I still might order a 2nd lmao.

reviews.name: Christina Keifer
reviews.review: My first initial order was bad candy. Looked like it got wet then dried. Immediately contacted support and a replacement was sent out. Very happy with the new product and the customer service

reviews.name: jaz
reviews.review: We had full sized candy bars and these ring pops and push pops for Halloween. The kids went NUTS about the push pops and ring pops, some of them ran away shouting to other kids to come get some. It was awesome! Both younger and older kids chose these over full size candy bars, we should‚Äôve had more of these because we ran out of these first. We will definitely get two or three boxes for next year, it made us a very popular trick or treat house and we are all about Halloween so we were really happy with the enthusiasm.

reviews.name: Rosalyn Saguidi
reviews.review: I got this for my daughter but I have also had a ring pop and a push pop or two she likes the juicy drops and the sour candies in the store. We pay about two dollars for one. This was an excellent buy

reviews.name: Cathy schlabach
reviews.review: I bought this for my son because they were all his favorite candy in one package! Great deal and a happy camper! Cuddos

reviews.name: Bianca Del Rio
reviews.review: As described and great price! Shipping was fast

reviews.name: Tay The Critter Mom
reviews.review: I got this for my niece and myself and i ended up eating most of it over the last several months lol. The watermelon ring pops are just EVERYTHING! Hate the blue raspberries, but my niece loves them, so it works out. Wish they were less expensive, but its worth it occasionally.

reviews.name: Grace
reviews.review: My daughter loves this candy but picking up item in the store is sometimes $4 so when I came across this I purchased right away. I gave her one piece at the time here and there and saved myself some money. She loved it! Very inexpensive way to buy candy.
